swift_container.description: Swift container in which files were uploaded

swift_object_prefix.description: Swift object prefix / object name used when uploading

swift_prefix_uri.description: Swift API URI which should be requested in order to get the list of objects for this upload complete event.  In the case where this event represents a full directory upload is complete, the URI will have ?prefix=<swift_object_prefix>.  In the case that this event only represents a single object from a larger directory upload, this will have ?prefix=<swift_object_prefix>/<full_path_to_object>.  In either case, requesting this URI will get you a list of objects relevant to this event.

$schema.description: The URI identifying the jsonschema for this event. This should be a short uri containing only the name and revision at the end of the URI path.  e.g. /schema_name/1.0.0 is acceptable. This often will (and should) match the schema's $id field.

uri.description: Unique URI identifying the event / resource

request_id.description: Unique ID of the request that caused the event=

dt.description: Time stamp of the event, in ISO-8601 format

stream.description: Name of the stream/queue that this event belongs in
